mainAspects: Importance of test automation and modern strategies
Roles focusing on leadership and mentorship in QA
whyImportant: The growing complexity of software systems necessitates a skilled workforce to ensure quality assurance. As organizations increasingly adopt agile and DevOps practices, the need for effective test automation strategies becomes critical for maintaining delivery speed and reliability.
suggestedActions: Develop and enhance skills in test automation and modern QA practices.
Pursue leadership training to prepare for roles that involve mentoring and guiding teams.
Stay updated on AI applications in testing to integrate innovative solutions into workflows.

referencePosts.content: [Location: Sheraton]Santechture IS HIRING Software Testing Lead  âœ¨What youâ€™ll do:ğŸ“Manage the testing team â€“ guide and support team members.ğŸ“Develop test plans for projects.ğŸ“Prepare summary reports on testing progress and results.ğŸ“Review and contribute to release notes.ğŸ“Review SRS (Software Requirement Specifications) for every release or change request.ğŸ“Prepare and execute test cases, test scripts, and test data.ğŸ“Report defects and assist in resolving them.ğŸ“Review updated test cases to ensure clarity and complete coverage.ğŸ“Estimate testing activities for project planning and delivery.ğŸ“Collaborate closely with other team members.ğŸ“Test web services and APIs using tools like JMeter, Postman, Selenium.More details: https://lnkd.in/defktBkp

referencePosts.content: Rockwell Automation is hashtag#hiring an experienced and dynamic QA/Testing Manager to lead our QA function across multiple programs. In this strategic role, you will:-Drive delivery excellence and implement modern test automation strategies-Lead AI/GenAI testing initiatives and infuse AI into testing workflows-Coach, mentor, and inspire teams to achieve high-quality outcomesWhat Weâ€™re Looking For:âœ§15+ years in QA/Testing, with 5+ years in leadership rolesâœ§Expertise in test automation, DevOps, CI/CD, and AI/GenAI testingâœ§Strong experience in delivery management and stakeholder engagementâœ§Define and implement enterprise-wide test strategy and automation frameworksâœ§Hands-on knowledge of modern tools and frameworks (Selenium, Playwright, Cypress, etc.)Location: Bangalore | Hybrid WorkingReporting To: Technical Director, Global Digital GCCIf youâ€™re interested please apply using the below link:https://lnkd.in/gsZ_GhBFPallav Purkayastha Sathyavathi Ramaiah Sampath Shetty Felix Rathinamhashtag#Hiring hashtag#QA hashtag#TestingManager hashtag#TestAutomation hashtag#GenAI hashtag#DigitalTransformation hashtag#Leadership hashtag#BangaloreJobs hashtag#CareerOpportunity
